name: Cheesecake Labs
tagline: World-Class Mobile & Web Apps Design & Development
description:
Cheesecake Labs is an industry-leading Mobile and Web apps design and development company. 
Founded in 2013, we work on a mission to positively impact people through technology by helping entrepreneurs and companies transform ideas into products and accelerate their business.

 
Client Testimony
"Cheesecake Labs has been a dream development partner. They do quality work and are extremelly skilled, communicative and motivated. They are a seamless extension of our team!"
– Lesley Kao, VP of Online Product Development, Singularity University

 
"The folks at Cheesecake Labs are highly organized. They're inclined to have regular meetings to ensure that we're keeping a good pace and in sync with project goals."
– Cameroon Robertson, CEO, Lockitron.

 
Service Offerings
Mobile & Web UI/UX Design
iOS App Development
